#summary A listing of all available algorithms and variants being developed by the Center for Domain Specific Computing.

= Algorithms =

==Image Reconstruction==
  * *EM+TV for Cone-beam CT*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=emtv3d-c%2B%2B.zip&can=2&q= C++ version] - [http://cdsc-image-processing-pipeline.googlecode.com/files/EMTV%20for%203D%20image%20reconstruction.pdf Documentation (PDF)]

==Image Restoration==
  * *Rician denoising*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=rician-denoise-matlab.zip&can=2&q= MATLAB version] - [http://cdsc-image-processing-pipeline.googlecode.com/files/riciandenoise.pdf Documentation (PDF)]
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=riciandenoise3mx_yi.c&can=2&q= C version]
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=rician-denoise-cnc.zip&can=2&q= Cnc version]

  * *Total variation-based deconvolution (with Poisson and Rician models)*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=tvdeconvolution.zip&can=2&q= C version] - [http://cdsc-image-processing-pipeline.googlecode.com/files/riciandeconv.pdf Documentation (PDF)]

==Registration==
  * *Fluid registration*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=fluidregistration-c%2B%2B.zip&can=2&q= Original C++ version]
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=REG_vec_MI.c&can=2&q= Simplified C version]
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=REG_vec_MI.hc&can=2&q= Simplified HC version]

==Segmentation==
  * *Two phase active contours*
     * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=twophaseseg-c%2B%2B.zip&can=2&q= C++ version]

  * *Front propagation*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=frontpropagation-c.zip&can=2&q= C++ version]

  * *Geodesic Active Contours (ITK)*
    * [http://code.google.com/p/cdsc-image-processing-pipeline/downloads/detail?name=itk-geodesic-seg-c%2B%2B.zip&can=2&q= Original C++ version (Requires ITK common libraries, see documentation)] - [http://cdsc-image-processing-pipeline.googlecode.com/files/README_GAC_itk.txt Documentation (TXT)]
